name: Advanced Mill Lite
description:
Advanced Mill is an iOS adaptation of the traditional board game Mill. The game also known as Merils and Nine Men's Morris. This is the ad supported version of the game.

Features:
Play against CPU - Advanced AI with two difficulty levels.
Undo function to take back moves.
Displaying elapsed time, number of turns, reason of win at the end of the game.
Checking and handling tie situations.
Optional hints for beginner players.
Displaying available moves.
Saving and loading games from Main Menu.
Autosaving game state - never lose a game on a call.
